poist.shapes

Class Shapes

  • java.lang.Object
    • poist.shapes.Shapes
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Line, Rectangle

    public abstract class Shapes
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an abstract class that represents types of shapes.
    Author:
    jpoist504

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double x
      x-location of the shape.
      protected double y
      y-location of the shape.

      Represents a shapes with location of (x,y).
      Shapes(double x, double y, java.awt.Color sColor, java.awt.Color fColor, int sWeight)
      Represents a shape with location of (x,y), stroke color of sColor, fill color of fColor, and strokeWeight of sWeight.

    • Field Detail

        protected double x
        x-location of the shape.

      • y

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shapes

        public Shapes(double x,
              double y)
        Represents a shapes with location of (x,y).
        Parameters:
        x - x-location of shape.
        y - y-location of shape.

      • Shapes

        public Shapes(double x,
              double y,
              java.awt.Color sColor,
              java.awt.Color fColor,
              int sWeight)
        Represents a shape with location of (x,y), stroke color of sColor, fill color of fColor, and strokeWeight of sWeight.
        Parameters:
        x - x-location of the shape.
        y - y-location of the shape.
        sColor - Stroke color of the shape. If you don't want a stroke color use the Color(255,255,255,0).
        fColor - Fill color do the shape. If you don't want a stroke color use the Color(255,255,255,0).
        sWeight - Stroke width of the shape.

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        public double getX()
        Accessor method for the x-location of the shape.
        Returns:
        x-value of the location of the shape.

      • getY

        public double getY()
        Accessor method for the y-location of the shape.
        Returns:
        y-value of the location of the shape.

      • move

        public void move(double x,
                 double y)
        Moves the shape to the x and y value passed in.
        Parameters:
        x - New x-location of the shape.
        y - New y-location of the shape.

      • moveBy

        public void moveBy(double x,
                   double y)
        increases the coordinates of the shape by x and y respectively
        Parameters:
        x - Amount you want to increase the x-coordinate by.
        y - Amount you want to increase the y-coordinate by.

      • calcArea

        public abstract double calcArea()
        Calculates and returns the area of the shape.
        Returns:
        The area of the shape.

      • calcPerimeter

        public abstract double calcPerimeter()
        Calculates and returns the perimeter of the shape.
        Returns:
        The perimeter of the shape.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Draws the shape in PApplet drawer.
        Parameters:
        drawer - The PApplet in which you wish to draw the shape in.
        Postcondition:
        drawer is changed to set stroke color, fill color, and stroke weight.

      • setFillColor

        public void setFillColor(java.awt.Color other)
        Sets the fill color of the shape to other.
        Parameters:
        other - Color that you want the fill of the shape to be.

      • setStrokeColor

        public void setStrokeColor(java.awt.Color other)
        Sets the stroke color of the shape to other.
        Parameters:
        other - Color that you want the stroke color of the shape to be.

      • setStrokeWidth

        public void setStrokeWidth(int other)
        Sets the stroke width of the shape to other.
        Parameters:
        other - What you want to set the stroke width of the shape to.
